channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: From banking to fashion, local businesses are targeting a growing middle-class consumer base keen to buy 'halal'.

item.title: Investors want to know what firms are spending more than earning

item.title: We Are a Gig Society Now
item.description: American institutions aren’t coming apart only because of a single cause or in a single way.

item.title: Firing Powell would hurt the dollar and U.S. economy, France says
item.description: “Donald Trump has hurt the credibility of the dollar with his aggressive moves on tariffs—for a long time,” French Finance Minister Eric Lombard said.

item.title: JD Vance Pretends Due Process Is Beside the Point
item.description: The faithful execution of the law must not be a casualty of the administration’s immigration policy.

item.title: What’s Really Stopping Us from Building More Houses

item.title: Ridicule Is The Final Frontier For The Ladies Of Blue Origin

item.description: The new season of 'The Last of Us' doesn’t coddle or lionize teenage girls but instead depicts them in all their obnoxious glory.
